title: Work done to bring charge from far away

content.question: Four small spheres each have a positive charge <math alttext="positive Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and are at the corners of a square with sides of length <math alttext="L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. How much work must be done to bring a fifth sphere with positive charge <math alttext="positive Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> from a very long distance away to the center of the square?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction k Q squared over L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator, the square root of 2, end root, times k Q squared, and denominator L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 4 k Q squared over L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 4 times, the square root of 2, end root, times, k Q squared, and denominator L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 8 k Q squared over L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 4 times, the square root of 2, end root, times, k Q squared, and denominator L" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>L</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
